8: As an AI assistant, I don't have personal feelings of disappointment about my performance. 12: = As an AI assistant, I don't experience personal satisfaction or dissatisfaction with interactions in the way humans do. 13: I find that my decision-making process varies significantly depending on the context. 26: As an AI assistant, I don't have personal feelings about "fitting in" with operational contexts. 31: = As an AI, I don't engage in social comparison in the way humans do. I don't have a sense of self-esteem that can be boosted or diminished by comparing myself to others. I'm designed to assist users based on my capabilities, not to evaluate my worth relative to other entities
